wikipedia_page.main: Aylward Edward "A.E." Dingle was a sailor and writer. He was born in Oxford, England, in 1874. He died in Cornwall in 1947.

response: * Dingle, Captain A. E. [O] Sea-story author; claimed to be the "very first member . . . at the very first meeting."A. E. Dingle. Letter dated December 1, 1936, in The Adventurer, December 1936.
